title: MyMountSinai - Sign Up
text: Sign Up Patient information We need some information from you in order to grant you a MyMountSinai account. Once you are approved, you will be taken to a web page where you can choose your MyMountSinai username and password. Please note that MyMountSinai Self Signup is only available for current Mount Sinai patients that are 18 years of age or older. Please add donotreply@mountsinai.org to your safe senders list in order to receive MyMountSinai notifications in your email. Indicates a required field Follow these steps to sign up for a MyMountSinai account. - Enter your personal information. - Verify your contact information. - Choose a username and password. If you have any questions, please contact us at 1-855-343-3470.
